entry.title: How To Seduce An Alpha Werewolf: A Guide By Stiles Stilinski
entry.summary:
Author: LS_5Ever

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,176Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 284

entry.title: Redlight
entry.summary:
Author: mossriddened

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,398Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Stiles saw the red light, staring ahead as it passed overhead -- and kept going. He didn’t even stop.He didn’t even flinch.It felt almost as if he wasn’t truly present in the driver’s seat, instead being somewhere behind the wheel, watching through the windshield as if it were nothing more than a screen. He felt floaty, entirely detached.He barely registered the speedometer as it climbed, streetlights streaking into lines in his window. He barely registered when red and blue lights joined in the mix behind him, almost blinding in the rearview mirrors as colors blended together.It was just lights.–––––––––or . .Stiles Stilinski gets put on house arrest for his own safety after breaking several traffic violations and running from the police. Although he can no longer drive away from his problems, he finds them, instead, in his reflection.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,763Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 24

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

entry.title: BLOODLINE PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,774Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 45

Summary: At Beacon Hills Preparatory, tradition is everything. For over a century, the elite boarding school has divided its student body into five historic houses where each one seemingly determined by a mix of academic performance, behavior, and an unspoken layer of socioeconomic legacy. Most students follow in the footsteps of their families; generation after generation they're sorted into the same houses. No one questions the system. It’s simply the way things are. Until now.Midway through his freshman year, a “routine” blood test for school health records takes an unexpected turn. One sharp-witted yet grounded Stiles, recently appointed as House Prefect of the mid-tier House Flagstaff largely due to his father’s position as the town sheriff, is abruptly reassigned to House Redwood, the school’s most elite and secretive house.He must now navigate secret traditions, political manipulation, and a slow-burning forbidden romance with someone he was never meant to meet: the enigmatic sophomore son of a ruthless defense attorney.

entry.title: Wanna Pet My Duck?
entry.summary:
Author: Jadezdominion

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,027Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: Stiles was out Easter shopping and was excited to have found the perfect sensory toy to appease his mind goblins. He wanted to share his excitement with his crush and Alpha, Derek 'Sweet Cheeks' Hale. Unfortunately, autocorrect would not allow Stiles to have a peaceful text exchange. It was an instrument of chaos, forged by Loki himself, that kept changing the 'u' in 'duck' to an 'i'. Stiles wanted to die.

entry.title: The Darker Side of You
entry.summary:
Author: Melpomene (Aconitehart)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,045Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 60

Summary: When Stiles grabs his glasses, he lets out a victory hoot, pumping his fist in excitement. He puts them back on and stands back up, leaning down to brush leaves and dirt off his knees and socks. They're a little dirty but that's okay, it's not like -A low growl.Fear skitters up his spine. Slowly, Stiles turns around, heart in his throat, and sees the - the werewolf.At least he thinks it's a werewolf. It doesn't look like anyone he knows. For one thing, it's monstrous, all furry and black, standing on two hock-jointed legs. Its chest is broad, skin inky-black and shiny under the moonlight. Its hands are massive, the fingers long and curved into wicked claws. Its face is utterly inhuman, with a snout and everything.The eyes burn like fire, searing red.An Alpha werewolf.

entry.title: Ears, Eggs, and Easter Mayhem
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 814Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Easter is anything but ordinary when the Beacon Hills pack comes together for a spring celebration full of color, chaos, and unexpected moments. Between laughter, light-hearted rivalry, and a few glittery surprises, bonds are tested, pranks go hilariously awry, and playful tensions spark in more ways than one. With tradition, teasing, and a touch of mischief in the air, the day turns into a memorable mix of love, laughter, and just a hint of trouble—exactly what you’d expect when this group gets together.

entry.title: Tell It to My Heart
entry.summary:
Author: LilOak

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,672Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 375

Summary: Stiles hadn’t wanted to get off the rink once he was in it but the Beacon Hills high school hockey team were rather impatient when it came time for their training slot. He was well and truly reacquainted with the ice, and not because he fell on his ass, twice, whilst attempting some of his more difficult moves. He didn’t feel ready to go home just yet. The idea of going home to an empty house and a microwave meal made his stomach twist and churn. He figured it wouldn’t hurt to hang around for the hockey gorillas to finish beating each other up so he could grab some extra time in the rink. If Stiles was being honest with himself maybe he enjoyed watching the boys get riled up and sweaty.Derek was so focused intently on getting to the exit as quick as possible that he didn’t notice at first that there was still someone on the ice…Or the figure skater/hockey player au no one asked for

entry.title: Fighting for Hope
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,021Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 32

Summary: In this story, Stiles Stilinski suffers a terrible tragedy: His beloved Dad gets killed in front of him and he gets deported into sexual slavery to be sold as a "American Virgin Boy Nr. 14" to an obscure elite of "suitors".Derek Hale had a questionable upbringing, to say the least. Due to a cruel intrigue spun by a wealthy family, he had ended up in prison.After breaking free, he swears to take revenge. What he did not anticipate was rescuing a young man named Stiles Stilinski instead.How will they escape the grasp of an internationally operating slavery syndicate?How will they help each other and find love and hope despite everything?

entry.title: Hale Confessions: The Stilinski Twin Easter Edition
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 742Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: On Easter evening, Peter Hale and Derek Hale share a rare, heartfelt moment as they watch their respective Stilinski mates—Isabelle and Stiles—laughing and playing in the garden. With whiskey in hand and the golden light of dusk casting long shadows, the Hale men reflect on love, fate, and the quiet chaos of being bound to someone as fiery and fiercely loyal as a Stilinski twin.Peter speaks openly about the years he spent chasing and loving Isabelle, admitting that even after a year of marriage, her presence still feels like a dream he’s afraid to wake from. Derek, newer to love but no less certain, confesses that Stiles is his home—messy, maddening, and absolutely irreplaceable.Their conversation is quiet but raw, touched by humor and honesty, as they acknowledge the protectiveness and passion that comes with loving a Stilinski. In the end, both men know they'd burn the world to protect what they have, bonded by the twin flames that stole their guarded hearts.

entry.title: Nothing's Holding Me Back Anymore
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,342Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 39

Summary: Derek Hale had always been a man of few words, his stoic demeanor a shield against the world. But when Stiles Stilinski turned eighteen, something shifted in the air of Beacon Hills. The lanky, sarcastic teenager had grown into himself, his sharp wit now paired with a confidence that made Derek's wolf stir. It started subtly—lingering glances during pack meetings, Derek's eyes tracing the curve of Stiles' jaw, the way his long fingers gestured wildly when he rambled. Derek tried to ignore it, but the pull was undeniable.
